ygData.subject: Re: Off Topic: King Ak'anon
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings All I have been keeping up with this off topic question and I have a bit of news that will burst your bubble a bit or perhaps not. The staff from the
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings All


I have been keeping up with this off topic question and I have a bit of news
that will burst your bubble a bit or perhaps not. The staff from the priest
can not be made by any quest or skill it is just an item from loot further
more it is not even a 2h weapon it is a 1h weapon I think it has 23 to 28
dly and has 10dmg a friend of mine killed the priest and had one for a
while... I have Heard a bit about other staff quests. There is one in the
quenos hills for a jaggedpine crook (a druid and ranger only weapon) for
this quest you must be below lvl 8 and have a top and bottom of a broken
staff.. If my memory servers it does about 5dmg and has 23 dly plus gives
like 5hp and mana. In the Karanas I have talked to people who have found
other staff segment pieces for what this quest is for I am not sure ( I have
been told there is 13 staff segments in all and the top looks like a skull
but I can not confirm this for sure) I hope this helps those out there.. As
for the King he looks like a small male human so that he can not be mistaken
as just another gnome a gm has told me that in the long run they were
thinking of adding a quest that he gives out but as for now he just acts
like another clockwork gnome.

Klade
14 lvl Magician (Povar)
